sense.def:
The depth of something
je razdalja med zgornjo in spodnjo površino nečesa, na primer reke.

seg.quote: None of the lakes was more than a few yards in depth.

sense.def:
The depth of a solid structure
je razdalja med prednjo in zadnjo stranjo nekega izdelka.

seg.quote: ...things buried in the depths of your store cupboard.

sense.def:
The depth of an emotion
je velika moč nekega čustva.

seg.quote: The depth of his concern was evident enough.

sense.def:
The depths of the ocean
so deli oceana, ki so daleč pod gladino.

To be in the depths of despair
pomeni, da smo izjemno nesrečni.

In the depths of winter
pomeni sredi zime, ko je najhladneje.

Če neko témo obdelujemo
in depth
, jo obravnavamo zelo temeljito in iz vseh zornih kotov.

To be out of one's depth
pomeni, da se lotevamo nečesa, kar je za nas prezahtevno.
